title: Trailing slash redirect does not work for prerendered pages

labels.name: ready to implement
labels.description: please submit PRs for these issues!

milestone.title: soon
milestone.description: stuff we want to do as soon as time allows

body:
### Describe the bug

After building the app, trailing slash redirects do not work for prerendered routes, returning a 404 instead.

This is because the @sveltejs/kit `server.respond` looks up the SSR manifest first, but cannot find the prerendered route, as they were removed from it in https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/pull/7541

https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/blob/089c405041b0267356281fc8ea5f19ecc331178b/packages/kit/src/runtime/server/respond.js#L94

### Reproduction

https://stackblitz.com/edit/github-vabxnk-zdpsdn?file=src%2Froutes%2Ftest%2F%2Bpage.svelte,src%2Froutes%2F%2Bpage.svelte

1. Run `pnpm build && pnpm preview`
2. Navigate to `/test/` and refresh the page.

#### Expected
Redirect from `/test/` to `/test`.

#### Actual
404 not found.

### Logs

```Shell
Error: Not found: /test/
    at resolve (file://file:///home/projects/github-vabxnk-zdpsdn/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:3232:18)
    at resolve (file://file:///home/projects/github-vabxnk-zdpsdn/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:3099:34)
    at #options.hooks.handle (file://file:///home/projects/github-vabxnk-zdpsdn/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:3276:59)
    at respond (file://file:///home/projects/github-vabxnk-zdpsdn/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:3097:43)
```


### System Info

```Shell
System:
    OS: Linux 5.0 undefined
    CPU: (8) x64 Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9880H CPU @ 2.30GHz
    Memory: 0 Bytes / 0 Bytes
    Shell: 1.0 - /bin/jsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 16.14.2 - /usr/local/bin/node
    Yarn: 1.22.19 - /usr/local/bin/yarn
    npm: 7.17.0 - /usr/local/bin/npm
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-auto: ^1.0.2 => 1.0.2 
    @sveltejs/kit: ^1.3.8 => 1.3.8 
    svelte: ^3.55.1 => 3.55.1 
    vite: ^4.0.4 => 4.0.4
```


### Severity

serious, but I can work around it

### Additional Information

Besides running `npm run preview` or `vite preview`, the behaviour varies for different platforms:

1. Netlify implements its own trailing slash redirect logic as the adapter has none and we can tell SvelteKit isn't handling it because it omits the `x-sveltekit-normalise` header in the redirect.
https://whimsical-croquembouche-bf1ae0.netlify.app/test/
2. `adapter-cloudflare` should allow sveltekit to handle it instead of the logic I implemented [here](https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/blob/089c405041b0267356281fc8ea5f19ecc331178b/packages/adapter-cloudflare/src/worker.js#L62).
3. `adapter-vercel` is unaffected because it uses static redirects from a vercel config file (`adapter-cloudflare` should do the same to bypass worker runs but that's for another day).
4. `adapter-node` currently never reaches `server.respond` because the handler before it doesn't differentiate between `about.html` and `about/index.html`.
5. Not sure which community adapters are affected by this.
